name: Vasque Talus AT Ultradry Hiking Boots - Men's
categories: Talus AT Ultra Dry Hiking Boots
description: Dependable boots with moulded footbeds and a built-in shank for stability, responsiveness, and sure-footed agility over varied terrain.  The upper is waterproof leather and mesh, while the solid EVA midsole gives you comfortable performance right out of the box.1.8mm waterproof nubuck leather and abrasion-resistant mesh.UltraDry waterproof-breathable membrane.Textile liner wicks moisture to keep your feet dry and comfortable.Rubber toe bumper protects the boot and your toes.Anatomical footbed made of dual density EVA.Enduralast EVA midsole with a TPU shank for stability.Durable Vasque Mega Nuasi outsoles use AxisGrip rubber for traction on loose and muddy trails.
